attributes.comment:
I would like to speak against the raising of fees for these services. My reasoning
for this is based in the area of International Adoption. As a family currently in the
adoption process, we have paid for the required services, but will have to pay for
the services again even though we do not have our child yet. It is not uncommon
for families to have to pay for these services more than once per each adoption.
While there are tax benefits and ways to contribute to accounts that are similar to
a 125/Cafeteria/HSA plan, these provide little relief during and even after the
adoption takes place.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Christina L. Sinclair
